title: How do I get out of this screen and join the game?
body:
There's no walk through of this part it forcibly makes you stare at the screen and there's no way past it. How do I get out of this to play the game?

https://gyazo.com/4ef1a65dd359c953606ef6dbfb88320e

replies.body:
This is clearly not a TFT bug report..

That does not look like the full window. In theory you should be able to select a champion to start with.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=PKbQ4unq,discussion-id=8yiHgZ0p,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-12-10T06:06:50.013+0000)
>
> This is clearly not a TFT bug report..
> 
> That does not look like the full window. In theory you should be able to select a champion to start with.

well these were the only 2 post it would let me post in. wouldn't give me any other selections i don't know why.

> [{quoted}](name=RhastaFhasta,realm=NA,application-id=PKbQ4unq,discussion-id=8yiHgZ0p,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-12-10T06:03:40.915+0000)
>
> Dat name tho

yea cause i can't make an account to play the game.....
